evidence.claim: Intelligent Machines Lab utilizes AWS and GCP for its infrastructure needs.
The company implements FHIR for health data exchange, ensuring compliance with modern health tech standards.
They leverage Kafka for real-time data streaming and integration across various platforms.
The use of X12 transaction sets demonstrates their capability in handling complex health transactions.
Intelligent Machines Lab employs cloud services like Azure and databases such as PostgreSQL for their application development.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 or EDI integrations for healthcare data exchange.
